seriesStmt.title: František Ignác Antonín Tůma: A thematic catalogue of his works

work.title: Vesperae de Confessore
Dixit Dominus · Confitebor · Beatus vir · Laudate pueri · Laudate Dominum · Magnificat

annot.p: mostly four half notes per bar; some bars comprise two or six half notes
